selectOperationLimit:
SELECT
								  o.id ,
								  `uid` ,
								 `time1`,
								  `time2`,
								  `time3`,
								  `time4`,
								  `time5`,
								  `time6`,
								  `time7`,
								  `time8`,
								  `time9`,
								  `time10`,
								  `time11`,
								  `time12`,
								  `time13`,
								  `time14`,
								  `time15`,
								  `time16`,
								  `time17`,
								  `time18`,
								  `time19`,
								  `time20`,
								  `time21`,
								  `time22`,
								  `time23`,
								  `time24`,
								  `create_time`,
								  IFNULL( (select id from bi_dim_spap.dim_app_plat a where a.name = o.os_name),- 9 ) as app_plat_id,
								  ifnull(channel,-9) as channel,
								  IFNULL((select id from bi_gather_spap.conf_app_version v where v.app_version = o.app_version and (select id from bi_dim_spap.dim_app_plat a where a.name = o.os_name) = v.app_plat_id ),-9) as app_version_id,
								  IFNULL(i.country_id,-9) as country_id,
								  IFNULL(i.region_id,-9) as region_id,
								  IFNULL(i.city_id,-9) as city_id,
								  `year`,
	                              `month`,
	                              `day`,
	                              `hour`,
	                               store_id
								FROM
									bi_interface_spap.usage_time o
								LEFT JOIN
									bi_dim_spap.dim_ip i on o.oper_ip = i.ip
								limit ${offset},${rows}
create_ods_operation:
CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS bi_ods_spap.ods_usage_time (
										  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
										  `uid` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID',
										  `time1` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time2` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time3` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time4` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time5` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time6` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time7` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time8` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time9` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time10` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time11` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time12` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time13` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time14` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time15` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time16` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time17` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time18` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time19` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time20` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time21` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time22` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time23` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `time24` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
										  `create_time` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '当前数据属于哪一天（时间戳：不包含时、分、秒、毫秒）',
										  
										  `app_plat_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL,
										  `country_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL,
										  `region_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL,
										  `city_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL,
										  `channel` int(6) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '渠道',
  										  `app_version_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '司派版本号',
										  `year` int(9) DEFAULT NULL,
										  `month` int(9) DEFAULT NULL,
										  `day` int(9) DEFAULT NULL,
										  `hour` int(9) DEFAULT NULL,
										  `store_id` int(9) DEFAULT NULL
								
								) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
